Text:
UNRATED?

2:08:44 - Rated Version

IMDB - Runtime: 130 min

other releases out there only has 123 min. Is this really unrated or what?

amazon.com makes it even more confusing. Try searching for die hard unrated. You'll get a 2 disc version saying it's unrated. But under "rating:" it says PG-13.     what????
Unrated my ass, it's  the sucky yippie-kay-yay edition.
